game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time has broken down, players take on the role of a Chronomancer tasked with repairing the fabric of reality. The once-peaceful realm of Tenria is now fragmented into disparate eras, each with its own unique culture and challenges.
game.beginning: The game begins in the era of Elyria, where ancient magic still lingers in the air. Players must navigate the sprawling city of Eldrador, gathering resources and allies to aid them on their quest. As they progress through the era, they will uncover a mysterious force known as 'The Devourer' that threatens to consume all of Tenria.
game.ending: With the fate of Tenria hanging in the balance, players must journey through the ages, solving puzzles and battling formidable foes to restore the timeline. Ultimately, they will face off against The Devourer in a final confrontation that will determine the future of the realm.
